title: Bakery: Multi-template Project Scaffolder
description: Transform cli-template into Bakery - a modular, extensible project scaffolder supporting multiple archetypes (CLI, API, Full-Stack, Effect), multiple frameworks (React, Vue, Next.js, TanStack Start, Hono, Express, Elysia), and a plugin system for custom templates. Uses EJS templating with template files instead of inline strings.

title: Rename project from cli-template to bakery
description: Update package.json name, bin entry, all references in code, README, and repository name. This is the foundation for the new identity.
